Title: Duplicate Advisory: Stored Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in Jenkins Folder-based Authorization Strategy Plugin
Description:
## Duplicate Advisory
This advisory has been withdrawn because it is a duplicate of GHSA-5vjc-qx43-r747. This link is maintained to preserve external references.

## Original Description
Jenkins Folder-based Authorization Strategy Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not escape the names of roles shown on the configuration form, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.
